description.raw:
I copied @scpeters's approach from [this SRCSim pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/75/increase-simulation-step-size-to-2ms/diff#chg-src/FinalsPlugin.cc). 

After a lot of testing using the teleop and head controls and bumping into things, this looks quite stable to me, and on my laptop it increases the RTF from 0.2 to 0.4.

I also tried doubling the current values, and while the diff drive seemed to work reasonably, the head controller was shaky.

I also changed the casters' params to match the wheels so the contacts are more stable.
